Package it.polimi.adaptanalyzertool.metrics

Class ServicesMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.adaptanalyzertool.metrics.ServicesMetrics
  • public final class ServicesMetrics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the metrics for the Services.

    It has to be used as a static class since no object must be instantiated before calling the methods that are all public and static.

    See Also:
    AbstractService, ProvidedService, RequiredService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static int AbsoluteAdaptability​(Architecture architecture, AbstractService service)
      The absolute adaptability of a service (AAS) measures the number of used components for providing a given service.
      static double InAction​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,ComponentGroup> architectureGroups, Workflow workflow, ProvidedService service)
      This metrics calculates the probability to find a given service active considering the dynamic analysis of the architecture.
      static double NumberOfExecutions​(Architecture architecture, AbstractService service)
      Defines the number of times a service is executed in a given architecture.
      static double ProbabilityToBeRunning​(Architecture architecture, AbstractService service)
      Defines the probability that a given service is running in a given moment in an architecture.
      static double RelativeAdaptability​(Architecture architecture, AbstractService service)
      The relative adaptability of a service (RAS) measures the number of used components that provide a given service with respect to the number of components actually offering such service.

    • Method Detail

      • NumberOfExecutions

        public static double NumberOfExecutions​(Architecture architecture,
                                        AbstractService service)
        Defines the number of times a service is executed in a given architecture.
        Parameters:
        architecture - the architecture where the service is.
        service - the service that has to be used to calculate its executions.
        Returns:
        the number of execution of the given service.

      • ProbabilityToBeRunning

        public static double ProbabilityToBeRunning​(Architecture architecture,
                                            AbstractService service)
        Defines the probability that a given service is running in a given moment in an architecture.
        Parameters:
        architecture - the architecture where the service is.
        service - the service that has to be used to calculate its probability to be running, can be a ProvidedService or a RequiredService.
        Returns:
        the probability of a service to be running in a given moment.

      • AbsoluteAdaptability

        public static int AbsoluteAdaptability​(Architecture architecture,
                                       AbstractService service)
        The absolute adaptability of a service (AAS) measures the number of used components for providing a given service.
        Parameters:
        architecture - the architecture where the service is.
        service - the service that is offered by the components.
        Returns:
        the number of used components that provide the required service.

      • RelativeAdaptability

        public static double RelativeAdaptability​(Architecture architecture,
                                          AbstractService service)
        The relative adaptability of a service (RAS) measures the number of used components that provide a given service with respect to the number of components actually offering such service.
        Parameters:
        architecture - the architecture where the service is.
        service - the service that is offered by the components.
        Returns:
        the percentage of used component for the required service.

      • InAction

        public static double InAction​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,ComponentGroup> architectureGroups,
                              Workflow workflow,
                              ProvidedService service)
        This metrics calculates the probability to find a given service active considering the dynamic analysis of the architecture.

        It considers all the possible paths available in the architecture workflow. Note that the workflow are specified per architecture and must be inputted by the user.

        Parameters:
        architectureGroups - the groups that the components form when they are replicated.
        workflow - the workflow associated with this architecture.
        service - the service to be analyzed.
        Returns:
        the probability to find a component active given a workflow for the architecture.
        See Also:
        Workflow
